#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int a,b,c;
    while(1)
    {
        cin>>a>>b>>c;
        if(a==0 && b==0 && c==0)
            break;
        if((b-a)==(c-b))
            cout<<"AP"<<' '<<c+(c-b)<<"\n";
        else
            cout<<"GP"<<' '<<c*(c/b)<<"\n";
    }




    return 0;
}
